flow_steps.1: Go to Sheet2 in the Excel workbook.
flow_steps.2: Left-click on cell G6 to select it.
flow_steps.3: Input the number '11111' into the selected cell.
flow_steps.4: Press Ctrl+S to save the workbook.
flow_steps.description:
PURPOSE:
Enter '11111' in G6 of Sheet2 of Excel and save.

actions_2.description: Left-click on cell G6 to select it.

actions_3.description: Input the number '11111' into the selected cell.

actions_4.description: Press Ctrl+S to save the workbook

flow_steps_1_handle_steps.1: 1: KEY_PRESS - Press 'Escape' to close the 'Save this file' dialog.
flow_steps_1_handle_steps.2: 2: LEFT_CLICK - Click on the 'Sheet2' tab to navigate to Sheet2.
flow_steps_1_handle_steps.description: Go to Sheet2 in the Excel workbook.

actions_1.description: Press 'Escape' to close the 'Save this file' dialog.

actions_2.description: Click on the 'Sheet2' tab to navigate to Sheet2.
